instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Plus Jakarta Sans' for all headings to give a modern Indonesian tech vibe.
Implement the 'Nusantara Teal' (#0891b2) as the primary brand color.
For the Dashboard, use the 'Control Room' grid layout: dense, data-rich, but with whitespace.
For the Landing Page, use the 'Tetris' grid with large typography and the provided images.
Ensure all forms (Login, Register, Add Property) use Shadcn Form components with Zod validation.
Use Recharts for the Analytics dashboard (Occupancy Rate, Revenue).
Implement a responsive sidebar for the dashboard navigation.
Use the provided image URLs for placeholders. Do not leave empty image blocks.
Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) sparingly, mainly for overlays.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable
